address_2: 4th Line, Green Villas, Aminpur PO, Ameenpur
area_comments: As per the copy of the sale deed provided, the total built up area is 3,840 sft (Ground Floor 1,280 sft, First Floor 1,280 sft, Second Floor 1,280 sft) and land area is 1,350 sft (150 sq. yds).
setback_comments: Setbacks to be maintained as per Panchayat permission: 5 ft from road, 3 ft on remaining sides.
amenities: Covered Car Park (one-time: NA, recurring: NA)
occupancy_comments: Based on available documents and address proof, the property is observed to be self-occupied by the owner.
construction_comments: Construction is fully completed as of the date of inspection and sale deed.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house situated at Plot No. 153, Green Villas, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District, Telangana.
• As per the sale deed, the land area is 150 sq. yds (1,350 sft) and the built-up area is 3,840 sft (Ground, First, Second Floors each 1,280 sft).
• The property is located in a residential area, surrounded primarily by other residential houses.
• The property is self-occupied by the owner.
• The house is fully constructed and in good exterior and interior condition.
• Amenities include covered car park.
• Setbacks, as per panchayat permission, are to be maintained at 5 ft from the road and 3 ft on other sides.
• As per blueprint/floor plan, the property consists of 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 3 halls, 2 kitchens, and 2 additional rooms.
• The property is not within 100m of any protected monument/area.
• For this value assessment, it is assumed that the property has clear title and all necessary approvals have been obtained.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 26-Jun-2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 26-Jun-2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
